head.title: Equity Debt Offerings Set for This Week

hedline.hl1: Equity Debt Offerings Set for This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Boston Properties Inc., Boston, Mass., 15 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Boston Properties Inc., Boston, Mass., 15 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
c-quential Inc., Cambridge, Mass., an initial public offering of 7.3 million class A shares. Lehman Brothers.
Crucell N.V., Leiden, The Netherlands, an initial offering of 8 million American depository shares, each representing 1 ordinary share. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Dendreon Corp., Seattle, Wash., 2.5 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Hydrogenics Corp., Woodbridge, Canada, an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Insmed Inc., Richmond, Va., 6 million shares. Robertson Stevens.
IXYS Corp., Santa Clara, Calif., 4 million shares. Stephens Inc.
MediChem Life Sciences Inc., Lemont, Ill., an initial public offering of 6.4 million shares. UBS Warburg.

Nippon Telegraph & Telephone Corp., Tokyo, 240 million American depository shares, each representing 1/200 share. Goldman, Sachs & Co., Merrill Lynch & Co., Salomon Smith Barney and Nomura Securities International Inc.
ONI Systems Inc., San Jose, Calif., 8 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and CS First Boston.
Queen Sand Resources Inc., Dallas, Tex., an initial public offering of 10 million shares. Friedman, Billings, Ramsey & Co.
